site.name: Meenal Balar
site.description: Meenal Balar — sketches, projects, notes, and reading list.

home.greeting: Hi! I'm Meenal. Welcome to my sandbox
bio: I'm drawn to people and projects devoted to human progress. My startup career has led me into classrooms, clinics, and communities around the world, expanding access and getting people online. I've loved helping builders of all kinds clarify their focus, unblock growth, or better yet, flip what's broken.
Now I'm picking up my pen and popping open the terminal. If you're in a similar space or want to trade notes, I'd love to hear from you.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Things I've built or helped bring to life.

notes.title: Notes
notes.description: Essays, reflections, and notes on things I'm learning.
